name: Farandolae
description:
A game inspired by Madeleine L'Engle's A Wind in the Door. In the book, the farandolae are tiny creatures that live inside mitochondria and create energy by whirling around in a kind of circular, linked dance.

Use the arrow keys to control your farandolae chain.

Collect yellow orbs to earn points and extend the length of the chain.

Thread the chain through itself to increase your score multiplier.
